title: Asymptotic Behavior of 2-d Black Holes
abstract: We consider the solutions of the field equations for the large $N$ dilaton gravity model in $1+1$ dimensions recently proposed by Callan, Giddings, Harvey and Strominger (CGHS). We find time dependant solutions with finite mass and vanishing flux in the weak coupling regime, as well as solutions which lie entirely in the Liouville region.
